channel.title: Omegle
channel.description:
http://omegle.com/ Post your favorite chats, you'll have fun here for hours.
remember do [ code] [ /code] to make the post smaller.
[code]Stranger: hi You: hi Stranger: 30/m/uk Stranger: you? You: 14/fm/usa You: I'll webcam you You: I love older men You: <3 Stranger: lol - tiny chat? You: SAD! Go outside you fucking kid You have disconnected. [/code]
Just have fun, get the trolling out of your system.

item.title: Omegle
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

You’re now chatting with a random stranger. Say hi!
Official messages from Omegle will not be sent with the label ‘Stranger:’. Strangers claiming to represent Omegle are lying.
Stranger: hey (18/m)
You: oh hey
You: 18/f/new york
Stranger: uk
Stranger: what you upto?
You: trying to figure out why the sky is blue
Stranger: google is your friend
You: what are your view on life?
Stranger: enjoy it as much as u can
Stranger: take risks!
You: do you know moparisthebest.com ?
Stranger: I do not
You: oh hold on ill send you a link.
Stranger: what is it
You: its a forum
You: im on there
Stranger: hehe well it’s easier if you give me ur msn/yahoo?
You: dont have
You: only use forum to talk
You: and of course omegle LO
You:
Stranger: that’s a shame u cant cam on any of them
You: hold on ill give you a link
You: to a vid of me
Stranger: alright brb btw
Stranger: im back
You: ok
You: well due to the forum having security
You: i cant link u to my actual profile
You: i can link you to my profiles picture box tho
You: i shortened the link for u
You: would u like it?
Stranger: give me the full one it’s fine
Stranger: no need to shorten it
You: its about 10 pages long hun
Stranger: I dont mind
You: and i cant copypaste it.
Stranger: why not?
You: wont let me paste into omegle.
You: idk, my computers dumb.
Stranger: show me shortened one then
You: i rather not have to type out 10 pages of url
You: is it ok that i used tinyurl?
You: or would u rather a diff shortening site?
Stranger: perfect
You: http://tinyurl.com/bqflr
You: enjoy hun
You: u enjoying it?
Stranger: hehe it’s good
You: fapping away?
Stranger: been fapping since 1 hour ago
You: wow thats a new record
You: I have been trolling you for about 20 minutes now
Stranger: uhm nah see that’s where you’re wrong
You: male, 17, USA
Stranger: I’ve been trolling you, newfag
You: sit the fuck down
You: did u enjoy the google in ur face?
You: is that how u get off everyday
You: TROLLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL
You: so newfag, what have you to say for yourself?
You: get lured into google.com?
You: someones desperateeeeee
You: Are u still fapping to google?
You: is that why you are so quiet
You: just admit defeat kid
You: i am the Troll King
You: Stranger, what have you to say for yourself?
You: except to admit total defeat.
You: Surrender yourself to the Troll King
You: and get a life and quit being so desperate o_O
You: u would have better luck getting with a blind deaf mute woman…
You: not even that
You: a blind, deaf, mute man, if that
You: we all know you like meat
You: Give up yet?
You: You do realize I have won this.
You: so you might as well gtfo newfag
You: btw say hi to your /b/oyfriend for me
You: Well I have more kids to troll
You: and i can’t waste my time here while ur fapping to google.
You: good day, and be less desperate. i should of just said goat/ireland u still woulda been all over it…
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
trolled this kid hard…

idk if it deserves it, but maybe a little rep for awesome meatspin lure? enjoy reading this, i enjoyed trolling him

EDIT] Please don’t derep me 0.0…

Read full topic

item.title: Omegle
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Stranger: No cyber for you today! You: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers. A peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked. If Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers, Where's the peck of pickled peppers Peter Piper picked? Stranger: LOL You: Can you answer it? Stranger: where did you get that? Stranger: no You: It's a question :( Stranger: I don't have an answer! Stranger: :( You: Can you can a can as a canner can can a can? You: If Stu chews shoes, should Stu choose the shoes he chews? Stranger: yes! You: Mr. See owned a saw. And Mr. Soar owned a seesaw. Now, See's saw sawed Soar's seesaw Before Soar saw See, Which made Soar sore. Had Soar seen See's saw Before See sawed Soar's seesaw, See's saw would not have sawed Soar's seesaw. So See's saw sawed Soar's seesaw. But it was sad to see Soar so sore just because See's saw sawed Soar's seesaw. Stranger: oh god! My brain will explode! Stranger: this is worse than cyber! You: One-one was a race horse. Two-two was one too. One-one won one race. Two-two won one too. You: If Pickford's packers packed a packet of crisps would the packet of crisps that Pickford's packers packed survive for two and a half years? You: Say hello to Mopar =D Stranger: Hello, Mopar! Stranger: what's mopar? You: A forum You: I hope you had fun =P You: One more? You: Mary Mac's mother's making Mary Mac marry me. My mother's making me marry Mary Mac. Will I always be so Merry when Mary's taking care of me? Will I always be so merry when I marry Mary Mac? Stranger: ok Stranger: LOL Stranger: you won't be merry, trust me. You: BYE! NO CYBER FOR YOO! You have disconnected.

Read full topic
